patterns: Tell me about JEE Main
What is JEE Main?
JEE Main details
What's the deal with JEE Main?
Can you tell me about JEE Main exam?
responses:
Purpose - For Admission in B. E./B. Tech., B. Arch., B. Planning.
Eligibility - Class 12 pass (PCM)
Application mode - Online
Documents:
1) Scanned image of candidates' photograph,
2) Scanned image of signature.
3) Scanned image of PwD certificate, if applicable.
4) Category certificate, if applicable.
5) The recent photograph should be either in colour or black and white with 80 per cent face (without mask) visible including ears. The photo should be taken against a white background.
6) Scanned photograph and signature should be in JPG/JPEG format only and clearly visible.
7) The size of the scanned photograph should be between 10 kb to 200 kb.
8) The size of the scanned signature should be between 4 kb to 30 kb and clearly visible.
9) The size of the scanned copy of the category and/or PwD certificate (SC/ST/OBC/EWS etc.) should be in pdf between 50kb to 300kb and clearly visible.
10) If it is found at any time that the candidate has used/uploaded the photograph, signature, and certificate(s) of someone else or has tampered his/her admit card/result/scorecard, these acts will be treated as Unfair Means (UFM) Practices.

patterns: Tell me about JEE Advanced
What is JEE Advanced?
JEE Advanced details
I want to know about JEE Advanced exam
Can you explain JEE Advanced to me?
responses:
Purpose- Admission in UG programmes in IITs
Eligibility - Class 12 Pass (PCM)
Application mode -Online.
Documents: 1) Birth certificate or Class X certificate
2) Class XII certificate for candidates appearing for the first time in 2023 or whose Board released the Class XII results for the academic session 2021-22 after October 25, 2022.
3) If available, a Class XII mark sheet for the 2024 exam.
4) Identity proof like Citizenship certificate, Foreign Passport, OCI/PIO Card.
5) If the candidate's name differs from the one on the Class X certificate, a Gazette notification for the name change.
6) For GEN-EWS/OBC-NCL category, the recommended certificate issue date should be on or after April 1, 2024. In case of non-availability, a Declaration in Lieu of GEN-EWS Certificate/OBC-NCL certificate is required.
7) For SC/ST category, the latest Caste (for SC) or tribe (for ST) certificate following the Government of India's guidelines (Refer to the official JEE Advanced 2024 information brochure for more details).

patterns: Tell me about BITSAT
What is BITSAT?
BITSAT details
I want to know about BITSAT exam
Can you explain BITSAT to me?
responses:
Purpose - Admission in Integrated First Degree programmes in BITS Pilani, Goa & Hyderabad campuses.
Eligibility - Class 12 pass (PCM)
Application mode - Online
Documents:1) Net banking/credit card/debit card details
2) Candidate's Photograph - 50 KB to 100 KB in JPEG/JPG format
3) Candidate's Signature - 10 KB to 100 KB in JPEG/ JPG format.
4) An attested photocopy of the Class X pass/ Matriculation/Secondary School certificate issued by the Board
5) An attested photocopy of the mark sheet of the qualifying examination and any other higher University/Board examinations passed

patterns: Tell me about MHT-CET
What is MHT-CET?
MHT-CET details
I want to know about MHT-CET exam
Can you explain MHT-CET to me?
responses:
Purpose - for admission in engineering,pharmacy,agriculture
Eligibility - passed 12th or the equivalent examination
Application Mode – Online
Documents
1) Class 10th Mark Sheet: Required for entering your Date of Birth and Roll Number details.
2) Aadhaar Card: Helpful for entering your Full Name, Father & Mother’s Name, and Communication Address.
3) Class 12th Details: Enter your Class 12th details, including the Name of the School, Passing Year, etc.
4) Category Certificate: If you belong to reserved categories, specify your caste/category in the application form.
5) Mobile Number & E-Mail ID: You must have a valid Mobile Number and e-mail ID for registration.

5) Passing Certificate
6) Migration Certificate

patterns: Tell me about Indian Navy B.Tech Entry Scheme
What is Indian Navy B.Tech Entry Scheme?
Indian Navy B.Tech Entry Scheme details
I want to know about Indian Navy B.Tech Entry Scheme
Can you explain Indian Navy B.Tech Entry Scheme to me?
responses:
Purpose - Admission in Indian Navy B.Tech course
Eligibility - Class 12 passed
Application mode - Online
Documents:
Aadhaar Card: A valid proof of identity.
Residential Proof: Document verifying your residential address.
Proof of Date of Birth: Such as a birth certificate.
Matriculation Certificate: Required for entering your Date of Birth and Roll Number details.
10+2 Pass Certificate: Scanned copy of your Class 12th mark sheet.
JEE (Main)-2023 Scorecard: If you have appeared for JEE (Main) in 2023.
Scanned Passport-Size Photograph: Ensure that the photograph meets the specified dimensions and clarity requirements.

patterns: Tell me about Indian Navy Sailors Recruitment
What is Indian Navy Sailors Recruitment?
Indian Navy Sailors Recruitment details
I want to know about Indian Navy Sailors Recruitment
Can you explain Indian Navy Sailors Recruitment to me?
responses:
Purpose - Admission in 24 weeks Basic training at INS Chilka followed by Professional training
Eligibility - Class 12 (Maths and
Physics/Chem./Bio/Computer Sc.)
Application mode - Online, By Post
a. Candidates need to punch and firmly tie the following documents with a strong thread to the Indian Navy SSR and AA application form in the sequence stated below
Completed application form with a spare recent passport size photograph.
Self-attested copies of the following certificates—
Matric /equivalent certificate for date of birth verification
Mark sheet and certificate of Diploma/Higher Board examination/ Matriculation as applicable.
Domicile certificate
Two self-addressed envelopes of size 22 x 10 cms.
Candidates need to affix Rupees 10/- stamp on one envelope and submit one envelope without the stamp along with the application form.
Candidates need to note the colour specifications of the envelopes—white colour envelop is for AA entry and brown colour envelope is for SSR/MR/NMR entry.
On the envelope containing the application, candidates should clearly mention—the type of entry, the state, exam percentage, and name of the exam passed.

patterns: Tell me about TISS-BAT

TISS-BAT details
I want to know about TISS-BAT exam
Can you explain TISS-BAT to me?
responses:
Purpose - Admission in Bachlors of Arts Social Sciences programme in any of three Campuses that is Tuljapur, Guwahati and Hyderabad
Eligibility - Class 12
Application mode - Online
Documents:
Admit Card of TISS BAT 2023: Make sure you have your admit card ready for the exam.
Score Card of TISS BAT 2023: Keep your scorecard accessible.
Class 10 certificate: Provide a scanned copy of your Class 10 examination certificate as proof of your name and date of birth.
Class 12 certificate: Similarly, include a scanned copy of your 12th-grade mark sheet.
Caste/Category certificate (if applicable): If you belong to a category other than the general category, ensure you have the relevant caste/category certificate issued by the competent authority.
